reviewText: My grandkids love all the Pocoyo DVD's.  They are so happy watching them and laugh over and over at the things happening in the movie.  Very cute
My three year old enjoys watching this DVD. She loves watching pocoyo and friends. It grabs her attention which is hard for a three year old.

We picked up this DVD on a recent road trip and my 5 year old and 2 year old both really enjoy Pocoyo. The DVD has 12 episodes which are: Pocoyolympics, Bat and Ball, Big Scary Slide, Magic Act, Get Lost Loula, Having a Ball, Not in my Backyard, Invisible Pocoyo, Guess What, Double Trouble, Sneaky Shoes and Dirty Dog. I like the theme among the episodes of sports and playing outside, I am very happy with this DVD.
My 2 year old daughter loves Yo Yo.  That is what she calls it! If I had to watch a cartoon, this would be it!

My 2 year old daughter & 4 year old son LOVE Pocoyo - This is a great DVD for little learners & lots of fun to watch!  The only tiff i have with it is it take WAY TOO LONG to get to the Pocoyo Clips because they over filled it with clips pushing other PBS shows, etc.  PS - I'd also recommend the entire Word World collection.  It's highly educational, fun, colorful and more!  I figured all Mommy's need to know about "Word World" too.  ;)
Just what I was expecting. ..
Adorable video, my grandson loves Pocoyo. Fast delivery and in perfect condition!
Pocoyo and gang are always fun to watch and very educational too. We even find ourselves watching these wonderful video's.
My niece who turned 4 is really a fanatic and she really loves pocoyo. loves watching pocoyo. gave her one to her collection
MY KID LOVES IT HE IS 3 YEARS OLD AND WE SPEAK SPANISH SO I BOUGHT IT SO HE CAN WATCH IT IN ENGLISH AND HE LOVES IT HE IS STARTING TO RECOGNIZE SOME WORDS HE ALREADY KNOW IN ENGLISH
dvd, packaging, all was great.  grkids like pocoyo on tv and this way they can watch it anytime, good purchase
My granddaughter loves Pocoyo so this was a good buy. Steven Fry makes for some laughter for adults as well
Very simple, clean, and wholesome entertainment for the kids.  I would recommend Pocoyo over Dora even.  About friendship, fun, and sharing.

My toddler LOVES Pocoyo and this DVD does not disappoint!  Love the short clips.  Just enough for a toddler's attention span.  Inventive and fun stories.  Pocoyo is quite the trouble-maker but he is adorable.

Presented this to my 4 year old son he was very happy seeing this and seem to love this DVD. Pocoyo is his favorite cartoon character along with Thomas the Train so I am happy that I purchased this for him
Great product - Love it!!
The kids love that and make them hard laugh. Fantastic.
my kids love Pocoyo , we live in Dubai , unfortunately the DVD did not work , as it work only in US.:'(
My 1.5 year old finds this Pocoyo dvd entertaining. We have at least 4 Pocoyo dvd's collected so far.
My kids love this show!! Very funny and keeps my busy bouncy babies still!! Good value for my money!! Thanks!!
Good!
Good !
Pocoyo and his friends are always good fun for the kids!
My son loves Pocoyo!
We just love all the Pocoyo dvds.
